Articles.Content:
[Here are the files to add OPM to K2.](https://kerbalstuff.com/mod/664/K2%20Outer%20Planet%20Mod%20Configuration) This is a small mod to add compatibility between Outer Planets Mod and K2 system resize. This contain 1 configuration file and a folder containing the enlarged ScaledSpace files for Kittopia. This does NOT redistribute ANY files from other authors and will only work when installed with the corresponding mods. Enjoy ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

License

[This mod is licensed](http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/4.0/)[CC-BY-NC-SA](http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/4.0/)
This mod should be added to K2 as an optional install
I would but I feel I would be able to keep it updated easier. Plus I plan to expand the mod and add compatiblity to all KT planet packs.
